description.narrative: Support to the education component, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Education â€“ General, Evaluation And Research, Learning Outcomes, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 5: By the end of 2021, the most vulnerable preschool and school-age children, adolescents and young people, of both sexes, in the 10 targeted provinces make greater use of inclusive, quality educational services, for improved learning outcomes and receive certification for this.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2019, the Education section reached 82 per cent of its resource mobilization target and 98 per cent of its resource utilization target. The funding prospects for the programme component for 2020-2022 are close to USD 50 million, which will ensure that the section is able to maintain a high level of activity. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:08/02/2020
